summary: A unique slant, profiling the life of Adolf Hitler as a child and his rise through the ranks of the National Socialist German Workers' Party prior to World War II.
cast: Peter Stormare|Friedrich von Thun|Peter O'Toole|Zoe Telford|Terence Harvey|Justin Salinger|Chris Larkin|James Babson|Patricia Netzer|Harvey Friedman|Nicole Marischka|Julie-Ann Hassett|Thomas Brodie-Sangster|Simon Sullivan|Robert Glenister|Ian Hogg|Filip Hes|Brendan Hughes|Howard Lotker|Robert Russell|David Fisher|Hana Frejková|Wolfgang Müller|Christopher Ettridge|Robert Carlyle|Stockard Channing|Jena Malone|Julianna Margulies|Matthew Modine|Liev Schreiber|David Calder|Marek Vasut|Bruce Byron|George Pensotti|Joel Kirby|Julian Wadham|Richard Haas|Richard Katz|Laurence Kennedy|Simon Chandler|Ned Vukovic|David O'Kelly|Gavin Stewart|Rod Grover|Richard Rowlands|John Comer|Terence Longdon|Christopher Bowen|Liliana Komorowska|Todd Kramer|Max von Thun|Jirí Zeman|Jirí Novotný|Mikulás Kren|Robert Orr|Jan Petrina|Jan Vosmik|Mike McGuffie|Ryan James|Jirí Knot|Dagmar Bláhová|Jan Kuzelka|Jeff Smith|Adam Bradley|Joel Sugerman|Jan Budar|Vladimír Kulhavý|Tomás Zástera|Roger Denesha|Jan Unger|Avi Muyderman|Timothy Otis|Nancy Bishop|Brian Caspe|Vitezslav Bouchner|Curtis Matthew|Erik Johanson|Jirí Maria Sieber

title: Hitler: El reinado del mal
